name: Candy Catcher Simulator
description: in this game,try catching as much lollipops as you can by using your basket as shown, move the basket by using the arrow keys in your keyboard, the more lollipops you get, the more score you reach! avoid getting the broccoli~ it decreases your health by 1 every time you get it by your basket. your health going low? try getting the bag of sugar if your health is low, it decreases your health by 1 every you get it by your basket! need more time? the clock will always help you, it adds 10 more seconds to the timer! enjoy!^^
